title: Magic of the mountains: summer and autumn
creator_contributor_role: Documentary Films of India, production company
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/India - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/India - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Kashmir - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Kashmir - Social life and customs
description: Kashmir, the summer playground of ancient kings and now a holiday resort. Formal Mogul gardens with fountains; flowers; work in papiermache and embroidery; life around the lakes; sports; trips into the mountains; the shepherds; autumn, harvest and fruit picking; the coming of winter.
